Description: Place the coffee machine over the counter top , put water and coffee powder in it, turn on the settings and switch on the coffee machine. When the coffee is ready it will pour it in the cup .
Put the dirty plates and bowls in the sink basin , turn on the faucet , wash the plates and bowls with dish sponge and soap from soap bottle.
Put apple on countertop. Use knife to slice apple. Place slices onto plate.
Insert slices of bread into toaster. Wait until the toaster pops them out. Place bread on plate.
Take egg out of fridge. Put the frying pan on Gasburner. Turner gasburner on. Crack the egg into frying pan. Leave it until the egg is done. Serve fried egg on plate.

Take lettuce. Cut it with knife. Turn on the gas burner.Heat the pot with water and boil the lettuce.
Fill a pot with water. Place pot with water on gasburner. Turn gasburner on. Wait until bubbles form. Then turn off gasburner.
Take the cracked egg in a bowl and carefully put it in the bin outside the window
Open the fridge. Take everything inside the fridge out.
take a potato and slice it with a knife, switch on the microwave and keep the sliced potato inside it.
take a wine bottle, open it and pour into a clean cup
open the fridge, store the fresh food in it
take a water, pour it into a clean cup.
switch on the stove keep a pan with water and put the potatoes in it and boil
firstly, check for the apple slices, if it is unused throw it
